messages.subject: self control/ was christians again
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/11/03 1:31:15 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/11/03 1:31:15 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Now, anyone know what I can give him to relieve the discomfort of a tummy
full of chocolate and toffee and rice-crispies?
>>

Have you tried Nux Vomica? Works like a charm on me.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
